unnormalised: Arre yaar, tumchea PAN card ABCDE1234F tumchea Aadhaar number-an 31/03 adim link korunk visrunk naka. Atam tem zaroori asa, na zalear tumkam ITR file korunk problem zatlo. Ani, tumi tumchem GSTIN 09AAAAA0000A1Z5 navin sudharne uprant update kelem? Tax season ekdom dokeddukicho!
normalised: Aye yaar, tujem P-A-N card A-B-C-D-E-one-two-three-four-F tujhea Aadhaar numberak thirty first march-a modem zoddunk visrunk naka. Te compulsory asa atam, na zalear, tukka tujem I-T-R file kortana problem zatat. Ani, tuvem tujem G-S-T-I-N zero-nine-triple-A-A-A-zero-zero-zero-zero-A-one-Z-five latest amendment-a uprant update kelem? Tax season ekdom dokdukicha!
